long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
100x Bot is a powerful Chrome extension designed to automate repetitive browser tasks, boosting your productivity by handling them with robotic precision. Whether you’re sourcing candidates from LinkedIn or performing other time-consuming tasks, 100x Bot offers a variety of pre-built workflows that simplify your daily routine.

With 100x Bot, you can select from ready-made automation flows, such as "Source Candidates from LinkedIn." Simply provide key details like hiring criteria, and the bot will efficiently browse through profiles, applying your filters, and saving suitable candidates to your pipeline.

This extension is designed for anyone looking to streamline their web-based tasks, whether for recruiting, data extraction, or other common workflows. Save time, increase efficiency, and focus on what matters most with 100x Bot – your personal browser automation assistant.
